snippet: Using a bag filled with newspaper clippings and water bottles instead of cash, an elderly woman turns the tables in the elaborate Chinese blessing scam.
abstract: MIchael Wilson Crime Scene column relates elaborate scam known as 'Chinese blessing' in which elderly Chinese immigrants, mostly women, are targeted and robbed of their valuables; notes that in one case, elderly Brooklyn woman who had read about the scam, alerted detectives while seemingly cooperating with perpetrators, leading to arrest of five recent arrivals from China, all charged with grand larceny.
lead_paragraph: Using a bag filled with newspaper clippings and water bottles instead of cash, an elderly woman turns the tables in the elaborate Chinese blessing scam.

headline.seo: In Chinese Blessing Scam, Suspects Become the Victims
